member.name: M:ParkyAPI.Controllers.NationalParksController.GetAllNationalParks
member.summary: Returns a list of all the national parks in the database

member.name: M:ParkyAPI.Controllers.NationalParksController.GetNationalParkById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a national park with the specified id or null if none is found

member.name: M:ParkyAPI.Controllers.NationalParksController.PostNationalPark(ParkyAPI.Models.DTOs.NationalParkDto)
member.summary: adds a national park to the existing record of national parks

member.name: M:ParkyAPI.Controllers.NationalParksController.UpdateNationalPark(System.Int32,ParkyAPI.Models.DTOs.NationalParkDto)
member.summary: updates the national park with the given id to the new provided values

member.name: M:ParkyAPI.Controllers.NationalParksController.DeleteNationalPark(System.Int32)
member.summary: deletes the national park with the given id from the record of national parks
